author: mattmann
msg: - make Batchmgr use a Monitor that is given to it rather than constructing another one
- make XmlRpcBatchMgr have the ability to persist a Job's status when it starts executing and when it completes
- make XmlRpcBatchMgrProxy do callbacks for XmlRpcBatchMgr to notify of JobStatus
- add JobStatus I/F for const string fields representing JobStatus
- take away removeJob method from JobQueue (moved to JobRepository)
- JobRepository I/F for persisting Job Information and default implementation of in memory JobRepository
- refactor scheduler allowing its available node method give back an available ResourceNode for use in the schedule function
- expose getJobStatus methods in external system I/F

author: mattmann
msg: - try to set the queue for the res mgr task job to the static task config property
QueueName: otherwise set it to the default queue name

author: mattmann
msg: - override the ProcessingNode met field inserted by the workflow mgr
